item.title: CVE-2022-4422|2024-08-03T01:41:44.440Z -- bulutses%20information%20technologies -- bulutdesk%20callcenter
item.description: Call Center System developed by Bulutses Information Technologies before version 3.0 has an unauthenticated Sql Injection vulnerability. This has been fixed in the version 3.0
